Front de Champagne et Argonne
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Taride, A. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 1 map : col. ; 65 x 50 cm., folded in envelope 19 x 14 cm.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Inset: Bois de la Gruerie area. [original]
Envelope: Front de Champagne et Argonne: Chalons, Reims, Rethel, Sainte-Menehould, Vouziers ... Prix: 1 Fr. net. ... [original]
"Cartes pour suivre les Op√©rations Militaires." -- from envelope verso. [original]

SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: With original printed envelope, as issued. Used by Frederick L. Brown, 2nd Lieut., Signal Corps, Meteorological Division, with his signature and map identification "No F." [original]
